entry.title: Unresolved Reference Issue in PyCharm
entry.content:
When I was using pycharm to develop a django app, I met the issue “unresolved reference” for importing modules.

Here is the page which shows how to solve thie issue.

html http://stackoverflow.com/questions/21236824/unresolved-reference-issue-in-pycharm

entry.title: Rebuild the Outlook for Mac2011
entry.content:
Several days ago, my outlook started to quit the moment it was started after a sudden system shutup.

There is a post and I followed it, it works for me now.

html source/_posts/2015-11-18-rebuild-the-outlook-for-mac2011.markdown

entry.title: How to Find the Password for Pidgin
entry.content:
Use the following command line to find the password for your account on pidgin:

bash cat $HOME/.purple/accounts.xml | grep pass and it works.
